LAN_A 10.8.0.0/8 653 +2 = 2^10=1024

ip   00001010.00001000.000000  00.00000000
mask 11111111.11111111.111111  00.00000000

SN   00001010.00001000.000000  00.00000000 - 10.8.0.0
BC   00001010.00001000.000000  11.11111111 - 10.8.3.255
Hmin 10.8.0.1
Hmax 10.8.3.254
  
LAN_B 172.16.8.0/12 63 +2 = 2^7=128

mask 11111111.11111111.11111111.1  0000000
